prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item (Author, Title, and Date of item if known)], A1015, Everett Needham Case papers, Special Collections and University Archives, Colgate University Libraries.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Archival Materials note
relatedmaterial.p: For more information about Case's involvement in the Milkshed Committee see: A1031, Milkshed Committee collection, Special Collections and University Archives, Colgate University Libraries.
